trans-unit.source: Represents a response from [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] that contains binary data as a stream.
trans-unit.target: 表示来自响应[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]，包含以流的形式的二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Disposition" name="Content-Disposition" href=""></xref> header field for the response stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Disposition" name="Content-Disposition" href=""></xref>响应流的标头字段。

trans-unit.source: When the `Content-Disposition` header is not present in the response, the ContentDisposition property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 当`Content-Disposition`标头不在响应中，存在 ContentDisposition 属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Disposition" name="Content-Disposition" href=""></xref> header field.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Disposition" name="Content-Disposition" href=""></xref>标头字段。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content type of the response stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取响应流的内容类型。

trans-unit.source: When the `Content-Type` header is not present in the response, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.ContentDisposition%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 当`Content-Type`标头不在响应中，存在<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.ContentDisposition%2A>属性返回`null`。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.ContentDisposition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content type of the response stream.
trans-unit.target: 响应流的内容类型。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放当前实例所使用的所有资源<xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Call the Dispose method when you have finished using the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>完成调用的 Dispose 方法

trans-unit.source: This releases resources held by the object.
trans-unit.target: 此释放由对象拥有的资源。

trans-unit.source: You should always do this to release the resources held by the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>; otherwise, the consumed resources will not be released until after the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> object.
trans-unit.target: 你应始终执行此操作以释放由持有的资源<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>; 否则为使用的资源不会释放垃圾回收器调用之后才<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>对象。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> </xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>

trans-unit.source: After the Dispose method is called and all references to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> are released, the memory used can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 调用方法以及对所有引用后<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>是可以发布，垃圾回收来回收使用的内存。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>

trans-unit.source: You cannot use <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> after calling the Dispose method.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>后调用的 Dispose 方法。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of headers from the response.
trans-unit.target: 获取响应标头的集合。

trans-unit.source: The response is a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> object that contains key-value pairs of strings for each header in the response.
trans-unit.target: 响应是<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>对象，其中包含的字符串的每个标头在响应中的键 / 值对。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>

trans-unit.source: The headers collection from the response message as a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> object.
trans-unit.target: 将响应消息作为该标头集合<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binary property data from the data service as a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: 以二进制流的形式从数据服务获取的二进制属性数据。

trans-unit.source: When a network errors occurs while reading from this stream, an error is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当读取此流发生网络错误时，将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.IO.Stream> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.IO.Stream>是只读的。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: You must call either the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> or the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method on the <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用任何一种<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>或<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A><xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>方法</xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A></xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse></xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the network connection remains open and unavailable to other applications.
trans-unit.target: 否则，网络连接将保持打开状态并且不可用于其他应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method is used to access the stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>方法用于访问流。</xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the binary property data.
trans-unit.target: 包含二进制属性数据的流。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse"></xref> is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse"></xref>已释放。
